name: Zac ❤️❤️💖💖
greetingText: I really love your left arm btw!
wishText:
Zac,

You are the gravity that keeps me steady, the rhythm in my quiet moments, the warmth that lingers even when you’re not near. Loving you isn’t just a feeling—it’s a state of being, something as natural as breath, as certain as the sun rising even when I can’t see it.

Lyla
